entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 except minus 23 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18 except minus 23 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
